Title: It's Better to Burn Out Than Fae Away
Plot: The Morrigan enlists Bo's help to find a tortured graffiti artist under her employ. The young painter has killed a Dark Fae, and his urban murals are exposing Fae secrets all over town ? with The Morrigan on the hook for his actions. In exchange for her help with the case, The Morrigan offers Bo information on breaking The Ash's hold on the Lauren.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, horror and sex scenes
